title: Richard Pryor-That Niggers Crazy-(1975 Full Album)
description:
That Nigger's Crazy is the third official album release by Richard Pryor. 
It was recorded live at Don Cornelius' Soul Train nightclub (named after his TV show) 
in early 1974. This album won the Grammy for Best Comedy Album for 1974. 
The album's title was derived from a remark made by Pryor himself in Wattstax.

Tracks:
"I Hope I'm Funny" - 3:28
2."Nigger With a Seizure" - 5:24
3."Have Your Ass Home By 11:00" - 2:30
4."Black and White Lifestyles" - 3:43
5."Exorcist" - 1:53
6."Wino Dealing with Dracula" - 2:11
7."Flying Saucers" - 1:09
8."The Back Down" - 3:37
9."Black Man/White Woman" - 0:55
10."Niggers vs. Police" - 1:42
11."Wino & Junkie" - 7:06
